name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 11, Shanwei, Guangdong. A woman posted that her father and a co-worker were electrocuted while working at a height, causing both to die on the spot. The doctor also confirmed this, but the contractor insisted that the rescue was ineffective and there was no explanation afterwards. Later, the woman learned from the lawyer that death after being sent to the hospital and death on the spot are two different accident concepts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 13, Suizhou, Hubei. It was reported online that a security guard of Country Garden Community had a conflict with a decoration worker, and then the worker stabbed several security guards with a knife. According to reports, the wounding person has been controlled by the police and the case is under further investigation.
The property staff said, "It was because the decoration worker did not go in yesterday, and when he came back today, there was a quarrel, and three of our staff were injured here."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 11, Tai'an, Shandong. Wuyue Plaza decorated the elevator with many flowers to celebrate Mother's Day, but they were snatched up by consumers. The mall responded: They were all gone in 5 minutes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Pingxiang City, Guangxi, May 13. Local residents said that the government had started digging fields before the land acquisition compensation money arrived, and the workers’ ID cards did not have their names and work units.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 13, in Harbin, Heilongjiang, an old lady preached on the subway and was criticized by passengers.
A young man accused the old lady, "China emphasizes cultural confidence, and you are now subverting our 5,000-year-old culture."
Another old man said, "You eat the Communist Party's food... You can believe whatever you want, you can't do this kind of thing in the carriage."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 13, the Ministry of Finance announced that it would issue 30-year, 20-year, and 50-year ultra-long-term special government bonds on May 17, May 24, and June 14, respectively.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 11, it was reported online that more than 600 parents of Zhejiang Taizhou Shusheng Primary School received a notice from the school. Because the government did not pay the "education service fee", the school's operation was seriously affected. In order to ensure the normal operation of all school work, it was decided to temporarily collect 20,000 yuan in tuition from each student.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 13, some netizens made suggestions on the Sichuan Government Questioning Platform, saying that in order to maintain the stable and sustainable development of Chengdu's real estate market, they hope that the government will introduce property tax as soon as possible so that people who have not bought houses can also contribute to the construction of the city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 13, Zhoukou, Henan. A man sat on the railroad tracks and smoked.
The train was about to arrive at the station, and the man was rescued and taken away by the station staff who rushed over.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 13, it was reported that Peng Congtao, deputy mayor of Lanqiao Town, Xi'an, was reported for "inviting someone else's wife to a KTV late at night, and after being rejected, he actually went to the door to petition."
On the 13th, the official issued a notice that the county party committee had intervened in the investigation of the issues related to the deputy mayor of Lanqiao Town reflected on the Internet. The deputy mayor has been suspended.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 13, the parents of Gu Zixi, a child who died in the Nantong bus accident, shouted at the government personnel who were on duty at the funeral home: "Don't go too far!"

In addition, regarding the online rumor that all relatives who came to visit Gu Zixi from other places were controlled, his family was under 24-hour protection, and they had to report when they went out, etc.

Gu Zixi's cousin said it was true and revealed that her family had also been interviewed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 12, Beijing. A lawyer posted a video to speak out for the girl who died in the Nantong bus accident, but the video was deleted by the platform.
The lawyer said that when deleting and blocking videos becomes commonplace, freedom of speech becomes a plastic flower in a vase, and the authenticity and independence of news media are gone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of May 14, the body of Gu Zixi, a child who died in the Nantong bus accident, was cremated. On the same day, Nantong citizens went to the funeral home to send the child off for the last time, but were blocked at the door and were not allowed to enter. Flowers could only be placed outside the door, which caused dissatisfaction among the citizens at the scene. The family members at the scene questioned the government personnel at the scene: "It’s fine if you control us, but what do you want to do?" "We (Gu Zixi) are children, not criminals."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, as water, electricity and gas prices have begun or are about to rise across the country, A-share water, gas and electricity sectors have all risen

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, an article titled "The second instance court "remotely controls" the first instance judge to "interrupt" the lawyer during the trial: "Be tough!"" has attracted public attention. The article said that on May 11, the Tianjun County People's Court publicly retried the case of Suo and others suspected of provoking disturbances. During the trial, the presiding judge suddenly announced a recess. After the members of the collegial panel left the court, the defense lawyer unexpectedly discovered that the judge of the higher court was "remotely controlling" the trial in real time through WeChat chat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 13, Xinyu, Jiangxi. It was reported online that a ride-hailing driver had purchased a BYD new energy vehicle less than a month ago, and suffered a cerebral hemorrhage due to leakage during driving. The family members put up banners and placed wreaths at the 4S store to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 13, Wuhan, Hubei. It was reported online that a student at Huazhong University of Science and Technology was hit by a falling branch and died on May 5. His father made a sad and angry statement in his circle of friends: "If I kill a few people at Huazhong University of Science and Technology, will the leaders of Huazhong University of Science and Technology take responsibility and resign? Choose a good time to say goodbye to this world." He also said that the leaders of Huazhong University of Science and Technology are sorry for their children. Since the school is not doing anything, "just let more students die in the school."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 13, Wuxi, Jiangsu. Wuxi BYD implemented a four-shift, five-day, eight-hour work system, which caused dissatisfaction among workers. (As we all know, the basic salary of Chinese factories is extremely low, and workers can only earn money through overtime pay) On that day, workers gathered in the factory area to strike and demand that the factory restore the night shift system. During the period, a worker fell asleep on the ground and was covered with a blue cloth by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 13, Xiamen, Fujian. Gymboree Early Childhood Education Center Mixc Store suddenly closed, and parents went to Mixc Mall to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the invitation of Xi Jinping, Putin will pay a state visit to China from May 16 to 17.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 12, Guangdong. A netizen posted a video saying that because a message sent by a relative in a family group triggered a sensitive word, she, as the group owner, received a call from the police that afternoon, asking her to disband the group chat as soon as possible. The police also threatened that they were watching her group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 14, the Huangdao campus of Qingdao University of Technology poured manure on roads and fences to prevent students from ordering takeout.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The video has been deleted and the school said it has called the police and asked students not to believe or spread rumors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 13, a student from Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications posted a video, complaining that "the morning exercise culture on American campuses is formalism," which resonated with his classmates. After the incident fermented, it was reported online that the student was taken away by the school on the 14th during class.
Afterwards, a counselor asked student leaders to report the video on Douyin. The video has been removed from the shelves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/hGgYYVwSFF

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, blogger "Li Haijun" posted a video of a traffic policeman directing traffic on the road. Later, netizens in the comment area discovered that the leather shoes worn by the traffic policeman were suspected to be from the Italian luxury brand Ferragamo. As of the time of posting, the video is no longer visible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The identity of the second girl in the Nantong bus accident was revealed. She is a Chinese-Japanese mixed-race girl whose parents run a Japanese food store in Nantong. The girl is currently in a serious coma.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/t8Zoknqu6q

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 14, Weihai, Shandong Province, a large number of citizens who were defrauded by private financing went to the Petition Bureau to defend their rights. During this period, an 83-year-old creditor representative was taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the girl who died in the Nantong bus accident was cremated, staff cleaned up the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 14, Ordos, Inner Mongolia. The developer of Sunac Fuhua Hall sold one house to multiple buyers, and the owners blocked the road to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 13, in Zhengzhou, Henan, construction workers who were owed wages came to the Jinshui District Government to sit in protest and seek help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, it is circulated among Nantong citizens that the parents of the children in the Nantong bus accident have been placed in the Nantong Marriott Hotel for one-on-one comfort work.
Some netizens said that they were called by the police station to take a statement because of their remarks related to the "Marriott Hotel".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 14, victims of Haiyin Wealth went to the Shanghai Municipal Bureau of Letters and Calls again to defend their rights. During the period, an elderly man was pushed down from the steps by police officers from the Shanghai Municipal Public Security Bureau.
